abstract: Ladenburg Thalmann analyst Richard Bove cut his price target on Wells Fargo and said the bank will take a charge of $40 billion in the fourth quarter related to the acquisition of Wachovia .
lead_paragraph: Ladenburg Thalmann analyst Richard Bove cut his price target on Wells Fargo and said the bank will take a charge of $40 billion in the fourth quarter related to the acquisition of Wachovia .

headline.main: Analyst Expects $40 Billion Charge for Wells Fargo
